mapper.insert: insert into member_table(id ,memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, birthdate, memberMobile, gender, authority, sign_up_date ) values (#{id},#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName},DATE(#{birthdate}), #{memberMobile}, #{gender}, 'A1', NOW())
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberAge=#{memberAge}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile} where id=#{id}
